--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, Philip Tucker <ptucker@g...> wrote:
> Yes, it is possible.  In fact we've done XOR runs before where the
> starting topology is completely disconnected (i.e., 0 connections)
and
> it is able to find a solution.
> 
> - Philip
> 
> > Does anyone know if its possible to start a net in ANJI with some
of
> > the inputs disconnected per FS-NEAT and
> > http://www.cs.utexas.edu/users/kstanley/neat.html#disconnected  ?
> > 
> > Thanks.

Thanks for your reply, Phillip.  

As a practical matter, is setting all connections to zero (including 
input connections) somthing that I set through the properties file or 
is it something I need to code?  Thanks again.
